pullrequest.title: Logging Part 8: Ignition tools `ign log` command

content.raw:
I've noticed that we currently seem to be missing unit/integration tests for the `ign log` CLI (like how we have `UNIT_ign_TEST.cc` for the `ign topic/service` CLI).

We do have unit tests for the API that `ign log` uses. I don't know if we should consider that sufficient or not.
content.html:
I've noticed that we currently seem to be missing unit/integration tests for the ign log CLI (like how we have UNIT_ign_TEST.cc for the ign topic/service CLI).

We do have unit tests for the API that ign log uses. I don't know if we should consider that sufficient or not.
